ada halawatha nagara sabhawata polis aarakshawa da yodawa thibu athara, rajya amathya sanath nishantha menma hitapu parlimenthu manthri shantha abesekara aadharakaruwan samanga ehi pamina sitimada wisheshathwayak.manthriwarun wisidenekugen samanwitha halawatha nagara sabhawa, eksath jathika pakshaye manthriwarun hathdeneku, shri lanka podujana peramuna saha shri lanka nidahas pakshaya niyojanaya karamin manthriwarun hayadeneku bagin saha janatha wimukthi peramune manthriwarayekugen samanwithayi.ada dinaye chandaya prakasha kirima sandaha danata rakshitha bandhanagaragatha kara sitina shri lanka podujana peramune manthri stanis lawus pranandu bandhanagara bas rathayakin sabhawata ragena aa athara, eeta manthriwarunge wirodhaya palawi thibenawa.
